SEARCH
Package pegasus.graphics

Class AbstractTriangle<V extends Vector<V>>

java.lang.Object
pegasus.graphics.AbstractTriangle<V>
Type Parameters:
V - The vector used to represent the vertices of this triangle
All Implemented Interfaces:
Triangle<V>
Direct Known Subclasses:
Triangle2D, Triangle3D
public abstract class AbstractTriangle<V extends Vector<V>> extends Object implements Triangle<V>
The abstract base class for triangles.
See Also:
  • Triangle
